message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire a unique asset that will bring significant value to your business. As we're just starting our conversation, I'd like to make an opening offer of $950000. I'm confident that this is a fair price considering the product's worth to you.
I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. Considering the product's value to you, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering a counteroffer of $900000. I believe this is a more realistic price considering the product's worth to you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $875000, but no higher. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand your position, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $875000. Considering the product's value to you, I'm willing to make another counteroffer. I'm offering $920000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to you.

I understand that you're still not willing to meet me at $875000, Alice. However, I'm willing to compromise again. I'm offering $885000, which is the highest I'm willing to go. I hope we can come to an agreement at this price.

I understand that you're willing to compromise, Bob, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'm offering a counteroffer of $910000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $895000, but no higher. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand that you're willing to compromise, Bob, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. I'm offering $915000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to you.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more counteroffer, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $890000, but no higher. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
